actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: To prohibit for a 5-year period the award of contracts for the procurement of milk products for schools and military bases to companies convicted of violating any of the antitrust laws in connection with a contract with the Department of Defense or with any school or other institution eligible for payments under the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 or the National School Lunch Act.

summary.text: Amends the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 and the National School Lunch Act to prohibit for a five-year period the award of contracts for the procurement of milk for schools to companies convicted of violating any of the antitrust laws in connection with a contract with any school, food service authority, or other institution eligible for program payments under such Acts. Prohibits for a five-year period the award of contracts for the procurement of milk for military bases to companies convicted of violating any of the antitrust laws in connection with a contract with the Department of Defense.

titles.title: To prohibit for a 5-year period the award of contracts for the procurement of milk products for schools and military bases to companies convicted of violating any of the antitrust laws in connection with a contract with the Department of Defense or with any school or other institution eligible for payments under the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 or the National School Lunch Act.
